label: enumerator_name
name: What is the enumerators name?
hint: Sheeg magaca qofka xog-aruuriyaha:

label: enumerator_phone
name: For enumerators: please enter your contact number
hint: Fadlan qor telefoonka qofka xog-aruuriyaha:

label: enumerator_agency
name: What organisation is conducting this survey?
hint: Sheeg hey'adda sameynaysa xog-aruurinta?

label: A
name: Introduction
hint: HORDHAC

label: consensus_note
name: Hi my name is ${enumerator_name} and I work for ${enumerator_agency}. We are currently conducting a survey on household needs and would like to ask you some questions about your current access to foodCOMMA income generating activitiesCOMMA health and WASH access. The survey usually takes around 30 minutes to complete. Any information you provide will be kept anonymous and confidential. This is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any question and/or quit at any point. HoweverCOMMA we hope you do participate as your views are important. Do you have any questions? May I begin now?
hint: Asalaamu AlaikumCOMMA Magaceygu waa ${enumerator_name}  Waxaan la shaqeynayaa ${enumerator_agency}. Waxaan qabaneynaa xog-aruurin ku saabsan xaaladaha nolol maalmeedka dadka deeegaanka COMMA waxaan jeclahay inaan ku weydiiyo su'aalo ku saabsan xaaladaada ee helida cuntada iyo kaabayaasha dhaqaalaha. Wareysigaan wuxuu qaadanayaa ku dhawaad 30 daqiiqo. War bixin kasta aad noo sheegtid waxay noqon doontaa mid qarsoodi ah. Wareysiga waxba laguuguma siinaayoCOMMA waad iska diidi kartaa ka jawaabida su'aalaha qaarkoodCOMMA ama wareysiga gabi ahaanba waad iska joojin kartaa. HadabaCOMMA waxaan rajeynaynaa inaad nagala qeyb gali doontid maadaama ay aragtidaadu muhiim inoo tahay. Wax su'aal ah miyaad i weydiineysaa? Ma bilaabi karnaa wareysiga?

label: declined_consent
name: If the respondent has declined consentCOMMA please end the interview and delete the form.
hint: Haddii uu qofka diido inuu ka qeyb qaato wareysigaCOMMA fadlan iska jooji wareysiga iskana xer foomka.

label: region
name: What region is the assessment being conducted in?
hint: Gobolkee ayaa laga qabanayaa xog-aruurinta?

label: district
name: What district is the assessment being conducted in?
hint: Sheeg degmadda laga aruurinaayo xogta?

label: settlement
name: What is the name of the settlement?
hint: Sheeg magaca xaafada/tuullada/kaamka ama magaca meel u dhow meesha xogta lagu aruurinaayo

label: settlement_other
name: If otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex:

label: idp_settlement
name: Is this an IDP settlement?
hint: Goobtaan ma tahay xero dad barakacayaal ay dagan yihiin?

label: B
name: Household demographics
hint: WARBIXINTA QOYSKA

label: resp_gender
name: What is the gender of the respondent?
hint: Sheeg jinsiga qofka kuu jawaabayo?

label: respondent_age
name: What is the age of the respondent? (For respondents between the age of 12 and 17 please ensure an adult/guardian is present)
hint: Sheeg da'da qofka kuu jawaabayo?

label: breadwinner
name: Who is the main breadwinner of the household?
hint: Yaa ka mas'uul ah qoyska?

label: household_expenditure
name: Who decides on household expenditure?
hint: Yaa go'aamiya isticmaalka/kharashaadka reerka?

label: hh_children
name: Are there children (aged 0 -17 years) in your household?
hint: Qoyska ma joogaan caruur da'doodu ay ka yar tahay 17 sano?

label: note_hh_demographics
name: Please give the number of household members in this household in each age and gender groupCOMMA _INCLUDING THE RESPONDENT_
hint: Fadlan sheeg tirada qoyskaaga ee halkaan ku suganCOMMA adigoo u kala soocaya da'da iyo jinsiga qof walba. _QOFKA KUU JAWAABAYO WAA INUU XISAABTA KU TIRSAN YAHAY_

label: total_hh_confirm
name: Please confirm the total number of household members is ${total_hh}
hint: Fadlan iska hubi wadarta guud ee tirada qoyskaaga inay tahay ${total_hh}
constraint_message: If the total number of HH members is incorrectCOMMA please review the demographics section for errors

label: note_vulnerability
name: How many of the following vulnerable people are in the household currently?
hint: Imisa qof oo qoyska ka tirsan ayaa ah ama leh tilmaamaha soo socda:

label: plw
name: Pregnant or lactating women
hint: Hooyo uur leh ama nuujineysa
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to total females in the age of 13-40 years old

label: disabled_chronic
name: Persons with disability or chronic illness
hint: Qof naafo ah ama qaba cudurada raaga (SokortaCOMMA dhiigkarCOMMA iwm)
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to total members of the household

label: sick_children
name: Sick children
hint: Caruur xanuusan
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to total children in the household

label: stress_members
name: Members suffering from psychological stress
hint: Dad ka cabanaya welwel nafsaani ah
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to total members of the household

label: uasc
name: Unaccompanied or separated children
hint: Caruur aan lala socon ama ka soocmay dadkooda/qosykooda
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to total children in the household

label: note_vuln_gender
name: If there are vulnerable peopleCOMMA please give more details of genderCOMMA PLEASE CONFIRM THE VALUES BEFORE YOU PROCEED!
hint: Haddii ay jiraan dad liitaCOMMA fadlan u kala sheeg jinsi ahaanCOMMA FADLAN ISKA HUBI TIROOYINKA INTAADAN KA GUDBIN!

label: disabled_chronic_male
name: Males with disability or chronic illness
hint: Rag naafo ah ama qaba cudurada raaga
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to total males in the household

label: disabled_chronic_female
name: Females with disability or chronic illness
hint: Dumar naafo ah ama qabta cudurada raaga
constraint_message: Total of males and females with diability or chronic illness should be equal to total members in the household with disability and chronic illness AND/OR females with diasbility should be less than or equal to total females in the household

label: sick_boys_under5
name: Sick male child under 5
hint: Wiilal xanuunsan
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to total number of under 5 boys in the household

label: sick_girls_under5
name: Sick female child under 5
hint: Gabdho xanuunsan
constraint_message: Total of sick boys and girls should be equal to total sick children in the household AND/OR sick girls under 5 should be less than or equal to total number of under 5 boys in the household

label: stress_boys
name: Boys suffering from psychological stress
hint: Wiilal qaba welwel nafsaani ah
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to number of boys in the household

label: stress_girls
name: Girls suffering from psychological stress
hint: Gabdho qaba welwel nafsaani ah
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to number of girls in the household

label: stress_men
name: Adult males suffering from psychological stress
hint: Rag qaangaar ah oo qaba welwel nafsaani ah
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal to number of adult males in the household

label: stress_women
name: Adult females suffering from psychological stress
hint: Dumar qaangaar ah oo qabta welwel nafsaani ah
constraint_message: Total of sick boys and girls should be equal to total sick children in the household AND/OR stress women should be less than or equal to number of adult females in the household

label: uasc_boys
name: Unaccompanied or separated boys
hint: Wiilal aan lala socon ama ka dhumay dadkooda
constraint_message: Should be less than or equal total number of boys in the household

label: uasc_girls
name: Unaccompanied or separated girls
hint: Gabdho aan lala socon ama ka dhumay dadkooda
constraint_message: Total of unaccompanied or sepearted boys and girls should be equal to total UASC children in the household AND/OR UASC girls should be less than or equal total number of girls in the household

label: C
name: Displacement
hint: BARAKACA/BARAKICIDA

label: household_origin
name: Is your household originally from this location?
hint: Qoyskaaga xaguu kasoo jeedaa asal ahaan?

label: yes_no_host
name: Have you always lived in this location?
hint: Meeshaan miyaa ku nooleyd waligaa?

label: idp
name: Internally displaced
hint: Qof barakace ah

label: yes_no_idp
name: Have you moved from another location in Somalia?
hint: Meel kale oo Somalia ka tirsan miyaad guurtay?

label: region_idp
name: What is your region of origin?
hint: Gobolkee kasoo jeedaa?

label: district_idp
name: What is your district of origin?
hint: Degmadee kasoo jeedaa?

label: settlement_idp
name: What is your settlement of origin?
hint: Deegaankee kasoo jeedaa?

label: settlement_idp_other
name: Please enter the name of the townCOMMA village or neighbourhood
hint: Fadlan qor magaca magaaladaCOMMA tuullada ama xaafada

label: returnee
name: Returnee
hint: Qaxooti (Qof Soomaali ah) kasoo laabte

label: yes_no_returnee
name: Are you a Somali returning to Somalia from another country?
hint: Miyaad tahay qof Soomaali ah oo kusoo laabanaya wadanka?

label: returnee_country
name: From which country is the household returning?
hint: Wadankee ayee qoyskaaga kasoo noqonayaan?

name: If otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex:

name: From which area of ${returnee_country} is the household returning?
hint: ${returnee_country} dhinacee ayee qoyskaaga kasoo noqonayaan?

label: returnee_area_other
name: If otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex:

name: From which settlement of ${returnee_area} is the household returning?
hint: ${returnee_country} deegaankee/xaafadee ayee qoyskaaga u noqonayaan?

label: returnee_settlement_other
name: If otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex:

label: registered_return
name: Did you register for voluntary return with UNHCR or authorities in your place of refugee?
hint: Malagu diiwaan geliyay barnaamijka soo celinta iskaaga ah ee UNHCR?

label: refugee
name: Refugee
hint: Qaxooti (aan Soomaali aheyn)

label: country_origin
name: From which country did this household travel?
hint: Wadankee qoyskaaga u safreen/qaxeen?

label: why_displaced
name: Reasons for displacement
hint: Sababta Barakacida

label: left_aoo
name: When did you leave your area of origin?
hint: Goormee kasoo tagtay deegaankaaga asalka ah?
constraint_message: Must be before today

label: arrived_current
name: When did you arrive at the current location? (answer cannot be longer than previous answer)
hint: Goormee imaatay goobta aad hadda joogtid?
constraint_message: Cannot be before date left AoO

label: multiple_displacements
name: Between leaving your area of originCOMMA and coming to the current locationCOMMA did you reside in any other locations?
hint: Markaad kasoo tagtay meesha asalka ilaa aad halkaan ka imaatoCOMMA ma jirtaa meel kale aad soo dagtay?

label: locations_lived
name: In totalCOMMA how many locations have you lived in since leaving your area of origin?
hint: Guud ahaanCOMMA imisa meel ayaad kusoo noolaatey ilaa tan aad kasoo tagtay deegaanka asalka?
constraint_message: Max of 20 locations

label: displacement_note
name: What are the three main reasons you left your previous location?
hint: Waa maxay sababaha ugu weyn ee aad uga soo tagtay meesha aad horey u deganayd?

label: disp_why1
name: First reason
hint: Sababta Koowaad

label: disp_why2
name: Second reason
hint: Sababta Labaad

label: disp_why3
name: Third reason
hint: Sababta Saddexaad
relevant: selected(${yes_no_host}COMMA"no") and not (selected(${disp_why1}COMMA"none")) and not (selected(${disp_why2}COMMA"none")) and not (selected(${disp_why1}COMMA"dontknow")) and not (selected(${disp_why2}COMMA"dontknow"))

label: disp_current_note
name: What are the top three reasons why you chose to come to this location?
hint: Waa maxay sababaha ugu weyn ee aad u dooratay inaad halkaan imaatid?

label: dest_loc_why1
name: First reason
hint: Sababta Koowaad

label: dest_loc_why2
name: Second reason
hint: Sababta Labaad

label: dest_loc_why3
name: Third reason
hint: Sababta Saddexaad
relevant: selected(${yes_no_host}COMMA"no") and not (selected(${dest_loc_why1}COMMA"no_reason")) and not (selected(${dest_loc_why1}COMMA"dontknow")) and not (selected(${dest_loc_why2}COMMA"no_reason")) and not (selected(${dest_loc_why2}COMMA"dontknow"))

label: returnee_remain_here
name: Do you intend to remain and settle in this location?
hint: Ma daneynaysaa inaad iska joogtid oo aad degtid halkaan?

label: when_continue
name: When will you move to your intended destination?
hint: Goormee u guureysaa meesha aad qorsheynaysid?

label: region_intended
name: Region
hint: Gobolka

label: district_intended
name: District
hint: Degmada

label: settlement_intended
name: Settlement
hint: Xaafada/Tuullada/Deegaanka/Kaamka/Dallada

name: Please enter the name of the townCOMMA village or neighbourhood
hint: Sheeg magaca xaafada/tuullada/kaamka ama magaca meel u dhow

label: D
name: Child Protection
hint: ILLAALINTA CARUURTA

label: beh_change
name: Have you noticed any changes in any of the children’s behavior in the last 3 monthsCOMMA whether positive or negative?
hint: Ma ku aragtay carruurta wax isbedel xaga dhaqanka ah 3 bilood ee la soo dhaafay haddii ay ahaan lahayd mid fiican ama  mid xun?

label: girls_beh_change
name: If you have noticed any behavior changes in any of the childrenCOMMA what kind of behavior changes have you noticed in girls? (Check all that apply.)
hint: Haddii aad ku aragtay wax isbedelo xaga dhaqanka ah cid ka mid ah carruurtaCOMMA waa maxay nooca isbedelada xaga dhanqanka ah ee aad ku aragtay gabdhaha? (Fadlan dooro dhamaan jawaaba ku haboon)
constraint: not(selected(.COMMA'none') and (selected(.COMMA'crying') or selected(.COMMA'aggressive') or selected(.COMMA'violence') or selected(.COMMA'disrespectful') or selected(.COMMA'sadness') or selected(.COMMA'substance_abuse') or selected(.COMMA'crimes') or selected(.COMMA'school_unwillingness') or selected(.COMMA'school_attending') or selected(.COMMA'not_willing_to_help') or selected(.COMMA'helping_more') or selected(.COMMA'caring_for_others') or selected(.COMMA'having_nightmares') or selected(.COMMA'anti_social') or selected(.COMMA'more_time_with_friends') or selected(.COMMA'more_time_on_sports') or selected(.COMMA'wanting_to_join_armed_groups') or selected(.COMMA'other')))
constraint_message: cannot select "none" and any other option

label: girls_beh_change_other
name: If otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: boys_beh_change
name: If you have noticed any behavior changes in any of the childrenCOMMA what kind of behavior changes have you noticed in boys? (Check all that apply.)
hint: Haddii aad ku aragtay wax isbedelo xaga dhaqanka ah cid ka mid ah carruurtaCOMMA waa maxay nooca isbedelada xaga dhanqanka ah ee aad ku aragtay wiilasha? (Fadlan dooro dhamaan jawaaba ku haboon)
constraint: not(selected(.COMMA'none') and (selected(.COMMA'crying') or selected(.COMMA'aggressive') or selected(.COMMA'violence') or selected(.COMMA'disrespectful') or selected(.COMMA'sadness') or selected(.COMMA'substance_abuse') or selected(.COMMA'crimes') or selected(.COMMA'school_unwillingness') or selected(.COMMA'school_attending') or selected(.COMMA'not_willing_to_help') or selected(.COMMA'helping_more') or selected(.COMMA'caring_for_others') or selected(.COMMA'having_nightmares') or selected(.COMMA'anti_social') or selected(.COMMA'more_time_with_friends') or selected(.COMMA'more_time_on_sports') or selected(.COMMA'wanting_to_join_armed_groups') or selected(.COMMA'other')))
constraint_message: cannot select "none" and any other option

label: boys_beh_change_other
name: If otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: separations
name: Separations
hint: Kala go'id/ kala harid

label: separated_members
name: Were any household members separated from the household within the past three months?
hint: Ma jiraan dad qoyska ka mid ah oo qoyska ka go'ay 3 bilood ee la soo dhaafay?

label: separations_number
name: Please indicate the number of separated members
hint: Fadlan sheeg tirada dadka qoyskooda ka haray ama ka dhumay xillga barakaca:

label: separated_boys
name: Separated boys
hint: Wiil aan lala socon ama ka dhumay dadkooda
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

label: separated_girls
name: Separated girls
hint: Gabar aan lala socon ama ka dhumay dadkooda
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

label: separated_male_assets
name: Adult male is in other location to protect property/ assets
hint: Wiil qaangaar oo meel kale jooga si uu u ilaaliyo hantida
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

label: separated_female_assets
name: Adult female is in other location to protect property/ assets
hint: Gabar qaangaar oo meel kale joogta si ay u ilaaliyo hantida
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

label: separated_male_other
name: Other adult male members separated
hint: Rag kale qaangaar ah oo kala dhumay ama haray
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

label: separated_female_other
name: Other adult female members separated
hint: Dumar kale qaangaar ah oo kala dhumay ama haray
constraint_message: Must not be illogically high

label: separation_circumstances
name: If children have been separated from the household within the past 3 monthsCOMMA was the separation voluntaryCOMMA accidental or forced?
hint: Haddi ay carruur laga gooyay qoyskooda ay jiraan 3 bilood ee la soo dhaafayCOMMA kala goyntan ma mid iskeeda ah baaCOMMA  mid shil ah ama mid la qasbay?

label: children_sep_reasons
name: If children have been separated from the household within the past 3 monthsCOMMA what are the main reasons for the separation? (Check all that apply.)
hint: Haddii ay carruur laga gooyay qoyska ay jiraan 3 b ilood ee la soo dhaafayCOMMAwaa maxay  sababaha ugu weyn ee keentay kala goynta?

label: children_sep_reasons_other
name: if otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: children_school
name: How many children in the household attend school?
hint: Imisa caruur oo qoyska ka tirsan ayaa iskuulka aada?
constraint_message: Must be less than total children in the households

label: children_dropout
name: Have any children dropped out of school in the last 6 months?
hint: Imisa caruur oo qoyska ka tirsan ayaa iskuulka ka hartay lixdii bilood ee lasoo dhaafay?

label: dropout_why
name: If yesCOMMA why?
hint: Haddii jawaabtu haa tahayCOMMA sheeg sababta?

label: children_work
name: How many children in the household work?
hint: Imisa caruur oo qoyska ka tirsan ayaa shaqeysa?
constraint_message: Must be less than total children in the households

label: children_harsh_work
name: Are there any children in this household who are involved in types of work that are harsh and dangerous for them?
hint: Ma jiraan carruur ka tirsan qoyska oo ka qeyb qaata noocyo shaqo oo dhib iyo halis ku ah iyaga?

label: children_harsh_work_type
name: What types of work are these children involved in?
hint: Waa maxay noocyada shaqo ay carruurtan ka qeyb qaataan?

label: children_harsh_work_type_other
name: if otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: E
name: Safety
hint: AMMAANKA

label: member_violence
name: Has anyone in the community has been threatenedCOMMA intimidatedCOMMA or experienced violence at any point in the last 3 months?
hint: Saddexdii bilood ee lasoo dhaafayCOMMA ma jiraa qof bulshada ka tirsan oo loo hanjabayCOMMA ama ay ku dhacday wax xad gudub ah?

label: violence_type
name: What violence has been experienced?
hint: Sheega nooca tacadiga ama xad gudubka loo geystay qofka/dadka?
constraint: not(selected(.COMMA'no_answer') and (selected(.COMMA'beating') or selected(.COMMA'gbv') or selected(.COMMA'other')))
constraint_message: cannot select "Chose not to answer" and any other option

label: violence_type_other
name: if otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: lost_belongings
name: Has anyone in the community had their  belongings taken from them at any point in the last 3 months?
hint: Saddexdii bilood ee lasoo dhaafayCOMMA ma jiraa qof bulshada ka tirsan oo laga qaatay waxa ay leeyhiin?

label: lost_belongings_how
name: If belongings were lost in the last 3 monthsCOMMA how did it happen?
hint: Haddii ay jiraan hanti lumay 3 bilood ee la soo dhaafayCOMMA sidee bay tani u dhacday?

label: lost_belongings_how_other
name: if otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: free_movement
name: Are people able to move freely in this community and the surrounding area?
hint: Dadka si xuriyad leh ma u socon karaan bulshada dhexdeeda iyo hareeraha?

label: movement_restrictions
name: What are the limits to free movement?
hint: Maxaa xadidaaya socodka xurta ah ee meesha?

label: movement_restrictions_other
name: if otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: hh_insecurity
name: Has anyone in the community felt or feared insecurity at any point in the last 3 months?
hint: Saddexdii bilood ee lasoo dhaafayCOMMA ma jiraa qof bulshada ka tirsan oo dareemay cabsi ama amaan daro?

label: hh_insecurity_cause
name: Is the insecurity the result of any of the following groups?
hint: Ammaan darada ma waxay ka dhalatay kuwan soo socda qaarkood?
constraint: not(selected(.COMMA'none') and (selected(.COMMA'local_militias') or selected(.COMMA'family_members') or selected(.COMMA'amisom') or selected(.COMMA'clan_conflict') or selected(.COMMA'criminals') or selected(.COMMA'snf') or selected(.COMMA'community_leaders') or selected(.COMMA'police') or selected(.COMMA'gatekeepers') or selected(.COMMA'other')))
constraint_message: cannot select "none" and any other option

label: hh_insecurity_cause_other
name: if otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: not_safe_men_boys
name: Are there areas where men and/ or boys do not feel safe?
hint: Ma jiraan meelo wiilasha iyo nimanka aysan ammaan ku heysan?

label: not_safe_men_boys_where
name: Where do men and boys not feel safe?
hint: Waa xagee meelaha wiilasha iyo nimanka aysan ammaanka ku heysan?
constraint: not(selected(.COMMA'no_answer') and (selected(.COMMA'shelters') or selected(.COMMA'camp_areas') or selected(.COMMA'waterpoint') or selected(.COMMA'latrines') or selected(.COMMA'bathing_areas') or selected(.COMMA'market') or selected(.COMMA'school') or selected(.COMMA'health_centre') or selected(.COMMA'feeding_distribution_point') or selected(.COMMA'other')))
constraint_message: cannot select "Chose not to answer" and any other option

label: not_safe_men_boys_where_other
name: if otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: not_safe_women_girls
name: Are there areas where women and/ or girls do not feel safe?
hint: Ma jiraan meelo gabdhaha iyo naagaha aysan ammaan ku heysan?

label: not_safe_women_girls_where
name: Where do women and girls not feel safe?
hint: Waa xagee meelaha gabdhaha iyo naagaha aysan ammaanka ku heysan?
constraint: not(selected(.COMMA'no_answer') and (selected(.COMMA'shelters') or selected(.COMMA'camp_areas') or selected(.COMMA'waterpoint') or selected(.COMMA'latrines') or selected(.COMMA'bathing_areas') or selected(.COMMA'market') or selected(.COMMA'school') or selected(.COMMA'health_centre') or selected(.COMMA'feeding_distribution_point') or selected(.COMMA'other')))
constraint_message: cannot select "Chose not to answer" and any other option

label: not_safe_women_girls_where_other
name: if otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: relations_host
name: How would you describe relations with the host community?
hint: Waa sidee xiriirka idinka dhaxeeya dadka deegaanka?

label: bad_relations_reason
name: If you think the relations with the host community are bad or very badCOMMA why are relations bad between displaced and host communities?
hint: Haddii aad u malayneyso in xiriirka aad la leedihiin dadka deegaanka mid xun ama aad u xunCOMMA waa maxay sababta uu u xun yahay xiriirka ka dhexeeyo barakacayaasha iyo dadka deegaanka?

label: bad_relations_reason_other
name: if otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: F
name: Living conditions
hint: XAALADAHA NOLOSHA

label: water_who_collects
name: Who normally collects water for the household?
hint: Yaa biyaha usoo dhaamiya qoyska xilli walba?

label: water_who_collects_other
name: If otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: water_distance
name: How long by foot is the nearest water point from your household?
hint: Imisa ayaa loo lugeynayaa goobaha goobta biyaha laga soo dhaansado?

label: water_distance_change
name: Has the distance travelled to collect water increased in the last six months?
hint: Lixdii bil ee lasoo dhaafayCOMMA wax is bedel ah miyaa ku dhacay masaafada aad jarto si aad biyo u soo dhaansato?

label: latrine_type
name: What type of latrine does your household have access to?
hint: Musqul noocee ayuu qoyskaaga isticmaalaa?

label: latrine_segregated
name: Are latrines separated by gender?
hint: Musqulaha ma u kala soocan yihiin Rag iyo dumar?

label: latrines_lockable
name: Are latrines lockable from the inside?
hint: Musqulaha maka xirmi karaan gudaha?

label: latrine_distance
name: How far are latrines from your household?
hint: Suuliga ilaa intee ayuu idiin jiraa?

label: bathing_facilities
name: Do you have access to bathing facilities?
hint: Ma heli kartaa goobta lagu quweesto/meedho jirka?

label: bathing_segregated
name: Are bathing facilities separated by gender?
hint: Goobaha lagu quweesto/meydho jirka ma u kala soocan yihiin rag iyo dumar?

label: bathing_distance
name: How far on foot are bathing facilities from your household?
hint: Imisa ayaa loo lugeynayaa goobaha lagu quweysto/meydho jirka?

label: shelter_number_people
name: How many people currently live in your shelter?
hint: Imisa qof ayaa ku nool aqalkaaga?
constraint_message: Not more than the total members of the household

label: shelter_shared
name: Do multiple families share your shelter?
hint: Qoysas kala duwan miyaa kula degan aqalka/guriga?

label: internal_separation
name: Is there internal separation within the shelter?
hint: Ma jiraa kala asturnaasho gudaha guriga?

label: internal_separation_type
name: What type of internal separation
hint: Waa noocee kala asturnaashaha ka jira gudaha guriga?

label: internal_separation_type_other
name: if otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex

label: light_night
name: Is there a source of light at night?
hint: Guriga ma leeyahay iftiin habeenkii?

label: shelter_lockable
name: Can you lock your shelter?
hint: Aqalkaaga ma xiran kartaa?

label: adequate_food
name: Is your household currently able to access enough food?
hint: Qoyskaaga ma heli karaan ama helaan cunto ku filan?

label: coping_strategies
name: Has your household used any of the following coping strategies in the past month to respond to a lack of food?
hint: Qoyskaaga ma isticmaaley midka ka mid ah qaababkaan cunto la'aan jirta awgeed?

label: G
name: Exclusion

label: excluded_groups
name: Are there any groups or individuals in the community that are unable to access basic services?
hint: Ma jiraan qeybo/shakhsiyaad ka mid ah bulshada oo aan awoodin inay helaan adeegyada aasaasiga ah?
constraint: not(selected(${excluded_groups}COMMA'none') and (selected(${excluded_groups}COMMA'widows') or selected(${excluded_groups}COMMA'phys_dis_women') or selected(${excluded_groups}COMMA'phys_dis_men') or selected(${excluded_groups}COMMA'ment_dis_women') or selected(${excluded_groups}COMMA'ment_dis_men') or selected(${excluded_groups}COMMA'elderly_women') or selected(${excluded_groups}COMMA'elderly_men') or selected(${excluded_groups}COMMA'female_households') or selected(${excluded_groups}COMMA'child_households')))
constraint_message: cannot select "none" and any other option

label: why_excluded
name: If yesCOMMA why?
hint: Haddii jawaabtu haa tahayCOMMA sheeg sababta?

label: services_excluded
name: What services are people most commonly excluded from?
hint: Sheeg adeegyada ay dadka inta badan helin?

label: aid_violence
name: Do you know of any time that delivery of humanitarian assistance has caused conflict or violence in the community?
hint: Ma jirtaa xilli ay dhacday in kaalmada/caawinaada ay sabab u aheyd isku dhac ama xad gudub ka dhex dhacay bulshada dhexdeeda?

label: aid_violence_types
name: If yesCOMMA which types of assisstance?
hint: Sheeg nooca kaalmada/caawinaada?

label: aid_violence_types_other
name: If otherCOMMA please specify
hint: Wax kaleCOMMA fadlan qeex:

label: resp_contact_details
name: Are you able to provide us your contact details so as to contact you if you we would require further clarification on some of your answers? Please note that we will not share your contact information to anyone else.

label: resp_name
name: What is the full name of the respondent?
hint: Sheeg magaca qofka kuu jawaabaya?

label: resp_contact_numb
name: What is your primary phone number?
hint: Sheeg telefoonka qofka kuu jawaabaya? Telefoonka uu qofka mar walba isticmaalo.
constraint_message: Shoud be 10 digits and starts with 0

label: H
name: End of interview
hint: DHAMAADKA WAREYSIGA

label: end_note
name: We have reached the end of the interview. Thank you for taking the time to talk to us today.
hint: Wareysiga wuu inoo dhamaaday. Aad baad ugu mahadsan tahay waqtigaaga!

label: gps
name: Please take the GPS coordinates of your location.
hint: Fadlan qaad GPS-ka goobta aad warbixinta ka aruurineysid.
